Qaclana

Modern Web Application Firewall in the open.

Qaclana is an open source project, aimed to creating a modern Web Application Firewall in the open. We believe that security is something that should be easy to adopt, be it by big corporations with a dedicated security team, be it by one-person web shops.

At this stage, there's no company behind Qaclana and it's being financially supported by the project's founder.

Resilient

The proxy and filters are able to work without a server, based on the last good known information.

Once the server is available again, the proxies and filters resumes the communication. This means that your site or service is always available and protected, no matter what.

  • Learn More

Scalable

Architected in a way that has, from day 1, support for multiple instances of the proxy, filter and server.

This means that Qaclana can be used in highly available scenarios, able to scale the parts that needs scaling for your specific scenario.

  • Learn More

Open Source

We believe this is the only reasonable way a security product can be trusted.

Being open source means that anyone can use it for free, anyone can inspect and audit it, and anyone can contribute new features and bug fixes.

  • Learn More

Qaclana

Qaclana is split into several modules, each with its own capabilities.

Flexible

You choose how to use Qaclana: at or behind your SSL termination point, all-in-one or with each component on its own box, on containers or bare metals, ...

Protects your backend

Qaclana compares the source of the request against common attack databases, blocking it before it even reaches your backend. It also learns how your website behaves, protecting it from data leaks.

Intuitive dashboard

Get an insight into what's going on in security terms on your website. Get to know how many attack attempts there are, in real time. Enable, disable or switch working modes for your whole farm with a single click.

Fast

A few milliseconds is all Qaclana needs to decide whether or not to block a request and keep your site or service secure. Generally, Qaclana is done in under 50ms.
